title: Beautiful Big 4 bedroom duplex apartment!
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Beautiful Big 4 bedroom duplex apartment! This apartment has a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Enjoy the convenience of laundry in the building. Hardwood floors. Close by to the Jefferson L, Morgan L, Central M trains. 

AMENITIES
• High Ceilings
• Hardwood floors
• Exposed brick
• Central A/C
• Video Intercom
• Laundry in building
• Eat In Kitchen
• Stainless Steel Appliances
• Stone countertops
• Granite countertops
• Built in microwave
• Hardwood Floors
• Duplex
• Basement
• Outdoor Space
• Roof access
• Shared backyard

If you are interested in a showing please text Kirby at 929-243-4946 !!
Mention listing ID:42137!!
Must meet income and credit requirement.
